name: Lonely Fortress
description:
You've arrived at the remote desert outpost that houses the Triforce...but taking it might not be as easy as you think...

A first-person tower-climbing game with VO...just the one tower, but it's not easy to reach the top. Expect to spend maybe half-an-hour figuring it out.

48 hour solo game jam project for Ludum Dare 20...theme: "It's dangerous to go alone - take this".  I've updated it to Unity 2017 and polished up the lighting slightly, but otherwise it's as submitted, warts and all.  FAIR WARNING: Y is inverted.

If you like it, follow me at @qixotl or @QuantumSoupLtd
